org.dgfoundation.amp.visibility.data

Class MeasuresVisibility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.visibility.data.DataVisibility
      • org.dgfoundation.amp.visibility.data.MeasuresVisibility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FMSettings

    public class MeasuresVisibility
extends DataVisibility
implements FMSettings
    Detects which measures are visible in Activity Form and can be further used, e.g. in report generation & filtering
